title: Amr85
author: Amr85
content: Hello everyone!with regards to my previous topicshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450277.0-and-https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5450890.0i have decided to auction the website at flippa! As it is a well know site for such business & it uses escrow.com to complete the sale. you can visit my website here https://btcusa.com/Here is the link to the auction 'I have the up-to-date stats regarding all the traffic directly from the cpanel:https://flippa.com/11533506-btcusa-com-was-created-13-years-before-bitcoin-back-in-the-1996-i-have-recently-acquired-it-turned-it-into-a-website-for-news-about-bitcoin-crypto-relatedIf you got any question about my website or the sale, please don't hesitate to contact me here or to my email: hello@btcusa.comThanks!
